resources.string: If you\'re not using a Pixel device, you shouldn\'t attempt to use this app. It could damage your device.
Your device appears to be reporting as a %1$s, but other factors make us unsure.
You\'re not using a Pixel device (or you\'re using an unknown model).
If you\'re sure it is, please report this as a bug.
This doesn\'t seem like a Google Pixel device.
Super! We\'ve confirmed root access on your device.
Uh oh! We couldn\'t confirm root access on your device, or you denied the superuser confirmation dialog.
To modify modem features, we need root access to your device.
